CustomField.description: Code identifying the size group of a county. For 1999-2000 DMA mapping, counties are broken into 4 size categories based on 1990 US census household counts. This county relates to DMA CODE 1. 6 = A Counties: All counties belonging, as of 6/30/1990, to the 21 largest metropolitan areas. 7 = B Counties: All counties not included in "A" that are in metropolitan areas with more than 85,000 households. 8 = C Counties: All counties not included in "A" or "B" that either have more than 20,000 households or are in metropolitan areas with more than 20,000 households. 9 = D Counties: All Remaining Counties.
CustomField.label: County Size Code
